title: Victoria Beckham shares very glam throwback picture from Spice Girl days
text:

Victoria Beckham has hit fans with a blast from the past.

Taking to Instagram , Posh shared a throwback snap with her 27 million followers of herself in an old advertising campaign.

She can be seen applying lip gloss, back during her days with the Spice Girls.

The star, who's married to footballing legend David, captioned the post: "Posh likes to use @victoriabeckhambeauty Lip Definer No. 2 + 3. What's your perfect nude? X Kisses VB."

Her dedicated legions of fans were quick to go into meltdown.

One gushed: "So beautiful, always Posh."

Another told Victoria that she's their "favourite Spice Girl."

(Image: Instagram)

A third reckoned she resembled another beautiful brunette star: "It is unbelievable how much you look like @catherinezetajones here!"

Posh also had fans talking recently when she spilled the beans about her 20 year marriage to hunk David.

Speaking with TODAY , she revealed: "The kids are our priority. Everything we do revolves around the kids. We both work really hard, we love what we do professionally.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

"We appreciate each other. We are very lucky to have found each other and we are growing together.

"It was love at first sight. It was love at first sight."

Getting hitched in 1999 and having four kids, Posh and David have refined their technique in keeping everyone close within the family.

She continued: "Communication is key [to being a family unit], we're very present in the kids' life, we love our family.

"Everything we do revolves around our family, working hard, great support team, both of our parents are very present and help with the kids."

Their kids - Brooklyn, Romeo, Cruz and Harper - have all been in the public eye since their births.
description: Victoria took her fans on a trip down memory lane as she shared a snap of her advertising a lip gloss during her time with the pop super group
